description: oval shape with flat top and bottom; lid hinged on one long side; knob ivory
markings: \'VO [intertwined]\', engraved, on ovoid plate on one long side; 3 small symbols, \'835\' and \'G/[dots arranged in a triangle]\', stamped, on bottom; symbol, stamped, at short side on edge of lid
object_name: Sugar bowl, from a three-piece service
title: Sugar bowl, from a three-piece service
